data.title: The human factor: the critical importance of effective teamwork and communication in providing safe care
data.meta_description: Effective communication and teamwork is essential for the delivery of high quality, safe patient care. Communication failures are an extremely common cause of inadvertent patient harm. The complexity of medical care, coupled with the inherent limitations of human performance, make it critically impo …
